entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • PersistedAssemblyBuilder, types throw exceptions even after created #108733
  • Sockets tests failing on wasi-wasm #108726
    10.0.0
  • SslStream.AuthenticateAsClientAsync has periodically spikes (every 5 minutes). #108721
    Future
  • [cdac] Deploy cdac with SOS in .NET 10 #108720
    10.0.0
  • Exception backtrace problem with .net6.0 on arm64 #108719
  • [Analyzer Proposal] Warn when passing an int value to DateTimeOffset.FromUnixTimeSeconds() #108712
    Future
  • [area-Tools-ILLink]: #108710
  • JIT: Strength reduction should be able to reason about field accesses on top of arrays #108706
    10.0.0
  • System.Text.Json: Improve polymorphism support form Interface-types #108705
    Future
  • Test failure: baseservices/TieredCompilation/BasicTest_DefaultMode_R2r/BasicTest_DefaultMode_R2r.cmd #108699
  • Test failure: baseservices/TieredCompilation/BasicTestWithMcj/BasicTestWithMcj.cmd #108698
  • [MacCatalyst] OperatingSystem is currently not working #108694

Closed

  • Direct P/Invoke does not seem to work when "encapsulated" in a library #108009
  • [macos] ld: library not found for -ld_classic when using non-xcode clang #108717
  • WinUI3 app compiled as AOT publishes managed pdb instead of native #108087
  • [API Proposal]: GeneratedCodeAttribute should have additional constructors #108443
    Future
  • I keep getting "Npgsql.NpgsqlException (0x80004005): Exception while performing SSL handshake" when I try to run migrations #107600
  • SuperPMI: Improve superpmi-diffs pipeline parallelism #93137
    Future
  • SuperPMI: Improve superpmi-diffs summarization #80719
    Future
  • Port System.Collections docs for .NET 9 APIs #105976
    9.0.0
  • Memory is not released when using TransactionScope with async option #108447
  • Assertion failed 'bbNumTryLast <= bbNumOuterTryLast' during 'Optimize layout' #108608
    9.0.0
  • windows/x86: Debug vs. Release - Avx512F.VL.TernaryLogic returns different result #107890
    9.0.0
  • ToString() method implementation for HttpResponseMessage class returns content.Type, instead of the content itself #108690
  • Cannot step over Debugger.Break() in m3 lldb #108541
    10.0.0
  • No explanation or working code example for WebSocketClient? How are we supposed to use this? Is this a bug? #108695
  • The Blazor InputFile Component should handle chunking when the file is uploaded #84685
    Future
  • X509Certificate2(string,string) obsoleted with no alternative #108692

PullRequests

Created

  • Avoid generic virtual dispatch for frozen collections alternate lookup #108732
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • [mono][interp] testing #108731
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Automatically synthesize ilproj assembly names for tests #108730
    area-ILTools-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] Tweak Invariant IndexOf logic #108729
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Globalization, 8.0.x
  • [release/9.0] Tweak Invariant IndexOf logic #108728
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Globalization, 9.0.0
  • Arm64: Use TYP_SIMD8 for AddAcross #108727
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Disable Comparer_get_Default test on linux-arm64-crossgen #108725
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Enable ApplyUpdateTest #108724
    needs-area-label
  • Remove managed EH code frames from stack trace #108723
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Doc updates #108722
    area-System.Security
  • [release/9.0] Backport "JIT: Run single EH region repair pass after layout" #108715
    Servicing-consider, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'release/6.0-staging' #108714
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [wasm] Stop testing with V8 and `wasmconsole` #108711
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [release/9.0] [browser] Make boot json file name configurable #108708
    Servicing-consider, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • System.Net Stress Tests Improvements 2 #108703
    area-System.Net
  • [RISC-V] Increase timeout for Options_RespectRequiredConstructorParameters_FeatureSwitch test #108702
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [browser] testing 4GB #108701
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 10.0.0
  • [LoongArch64] Remove the register tp and rewrite the definition of PTFF_SAVE_* in NativeAOT. #108697
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, arch-loongarch64
  • [LoongArch64] Remove the register tp from callee saved registers in coreclr. #108696
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • Delete UsePublishedCrossgen2 property #108693
    area-crossgen2-coreclr

Merged

  • [ppc64le] Fixed assertion failure which was occurring while running System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters tests #108429
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Tweak Invariant IndexOf logic #108709
    area-System.Globalization, 10.0.0
  • [RISC-V] Transfer arguments between calling conventions in shuffling thunks #107282
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Don't error for NuGet audit on non-official builds #108718
    area-Infrastructure
  • Normalize `--` and case for options in src/tests/build.sh like we do in eng/build(-commons).sh #107425
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Bringing commits over from internal/release/8.0 #108716
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries, area-codeflow
  • [release/9.0] linux/arm64: Verify TLS resolver code #108564
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [release/9.0] Fix IL2104 link #108533
    Servicing-approved, linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink, 9.0.0
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0 #108675
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow
  • Update SystemTextJsonToolsetVersion #108704
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • JIT: Run single EH region repair pass after layout #108634
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono] Fix wording around when objects are entering degraded gc mode #108411
    area-GC-mono
  • Fix macOS arm64 Unix breakpoint #108560
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • [browser][debugging][release/9.0] Removed trailing command that results in a warning #108584
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Update stepping through MulticastDelegate under the Debugger #108414
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [release/9.0] Update the component resources for the VS descriptions #108304
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure, area-Workloads

Updated

  • Delete DomainAssembly #108618
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add Message property to ExperimentalAttribute #108216
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Fix GCStart message in StressLog and StressLogAnalyzer #108655
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Ensure to use float reserved register for TYP_SIMD12 #108629
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Add loop-aware RPO, and use as LSRA's block sequence #108086
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [WASI] Updates to work with up coming Wasi sdk #108687
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, community-contribution, os-wasi
  • Reduce memory usage when updating ZipArchives #102704
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • Implement `IUtf8SpanParsable` on `IPAddress` and `IPNetwork` #102144
    area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [release/9.0] [wasm] Include browser targets if RID is not wasi-wasm #108434
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 9.0.0
  • [cdac] ExecutionManager contract and RangeSectionMap lookup unit tests #108685
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Fix an issue with the last level cache values on Linux running on certain AMD Processors #108492
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Disable linux-x64 dev-innerloop #108581
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix SortedSet.InternalIndexOf 102118 #102249
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • Mark or set encoding param in StreamReader ctor to be nullable #108542
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Do not ignore `MemoryMarshal.TryWrite` result in `Guid` #108661
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'release/8.0-staging' #108495
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [Ppc64le] binaryformatter and tensors tests fix #108120
    Servicing-approved, area-Codegen-JIT-mono, community-contribution, arch-ppc64le
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2556498 #107711
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • JIT: Move hot/cold splitting phase to backend #108639
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasi] Remove unused string parameter from mono_wasm_load_runtime #104608
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [wasm] Use the cross-amd64 image #102069
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • JIT: Advance cursors through stores in strength reduction #105267
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] stop using mmap/munmap #108512
    arch-wasm, area-GC-mono, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • [mono] Use llvm 19.1.0 #105427
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/9.0] [mono] [Swift interop] Fix InlineArray lowering with static fields #108653
    Servicing-consider, os-ios, os-tvos, area-Interop-mono, 9.0.0
  • add new JsonIgnoreAttribute WhenWriting/WhenReading #104562
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • Compile the minipal as an object and static library #107889
    area-Infrastructure
  • Use live apphost when publishing ilc as singlefile #105004
    os-freebsd, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Avoid spilling loads of static readonly variables #108579
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Delete STUBLINKER_GENERATES_UNWIND_INFO #108684
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Remove all kernel32.dll references and debug breakpoints #108647
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix TRACE_GC build #108089
    area-GC-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Application DispatcherUnhandledException is not observed #2708

PullRequests

Created

  • Add readme and some fixes. #2709
  • [SwiftBindings] Documented binding PATs and alternative to vtables #2707
    area-SwiftBindings
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Increase LLVM module count #2706

Merged

  • Interpreter Fixes (#108485) #2698
    area-CoreclrInterpreter
  • Add experimental Swift bindings for CryptoKit #2704
    area-SwiftBindings

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Implement stack traces on WASI via precise virtual unwinding #2697
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM
  • NativeAOT-LLVM: Wasm separate DWARF debug to different file #2264
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Adding roslyn version info in the `dotnet --info` output #44041
  • `Microsoft.DotNet.Cli.Utils.csproj` is built twice causing PDB mismatch on some platforms #44033
  • Building with SDK 8.0.403 unexpectedly generates WinRT-related code #44026
  • The "ResolveTargetingPackAssets" task failed unexpectedly. #44021
  • Dotnet watch and hot reload does not work in Linux projects when there is a dot in the folder name of the project #44010
  • Allow dotnet-something to be more than executable files #44009
  • Application fails to call .NET9.0 RTM dlls after installing .NET10.0 SDK #44007
  • The .NET SDK Warning NETSDK1214 is inconsistant between .NET 9.0 and .NET 8.0.40x SDKs #44006

Closed

  • [NETSDKE2E] With 9.0.100-rtm SDK installed, Warning: "Workload garbage collection failed with error: Workload version 9.0.100-rtm.24477.19 was not found.." happens when installing maui workload. #43777
  • dotnet test treating xunit skipped tests as failures #43960

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/9.0.1xx] WebSdk: new 'OneDeploy' publish method #44038
    Servicing-consider, Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'release/8.0.4xx' #44037
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update SystemTextJsonToolsetPackageVersion #44029
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #44022
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Expand osx-arm64 test coverage #44008
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • .NET Source-Build 9.0.100-rc.2.24474.1 October 2024 Updates #43993
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Bump OmniSharp Version to latest #44036
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update aspire to pull in remaining control changes #43998
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.3xx' #44030
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/8.0.1xx' #44031
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merging internal commits for release/8.0.3xx #43983
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merging internal commits for release/8.0.4xx #43985
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add nowarn for NU1903 #44028
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0.4xx #43981
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Expand EOL list to include net7 6 months after it goes OOS per design #43440
    Servicing-consider, Area-Infrastructure, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, Branch Lockdown
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0.1xx #43980
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/9.0.1xx] [StaticWebAssets] Fix legacy package definitions design time builds #43937
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update SB Prebuilts Tarball #43979
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove the 6.0 and 8.0 templates #43954
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • use SpecialFolder.UserProfile in few places #43826
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2556813 #43920
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merge from rc2 to ensure we have internal flow changes #43987
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.1xx' => 'release/9.0.2xx' #43839
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/8.0.1xx] Add Dev Device ID #43357
    Servicing-consider, Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/8.0.3xx] Add Dev Device ID #43360
    Servicing-consider, Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • WASM and agent refactoring #43975
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • [release/9.0.1xx] AuthHandshakeMessageHandler: sync behavior with other clients. #43942
    Servicing-consider, Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove old source-build controls #43479
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, DO NOT MERGE
  • Update the sdk target to net10.0 #43015
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Change from "sln" to "solution" as primary, and add "sln" as alias #43607
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Document for new feature, Area-VMR
  • When updating workload versions, don't try to update to an older version, or to the same version currently installed #43931
  • Merging internal commits for release/8.0.1xx #43982
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [Backport] Backports perf fixes to static web assets to RTM #43971
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Join assets from verticals in the final join point #43627
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [StaticWebAssets] Process endpoint definitions in parallel #43736
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.2xx' => 'main' #43959
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-09
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Disallow interfaces with static virtual members as type arguments #5955
  • [Proposal]: Compatibility through coexistence between extension types and extension methods #8496

PullRequests

Created

  • Update extensions_v2.md #8502

Merged

  • Update LDM-2024-10-02.md #8500

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Synthesized backing field generated for non-auto property with `[field:]` attribute #75459
  • The .NET 9 RC1 SDK is blocking a few integration test #75458
  • EE and EnC integration tests require updated Visual Studio debugger #75456
  • Migrate the target framework in our builds #75453
    17.13
  • InlineArray elements are zeroed by debugger #75447

Closed

  • NullRef in GenerateVariable.CSharpGenerateVariableCodeFixProvider.GetCodeActionsAsync #75204
    Backlog
  • IDE0300 Collection Initialization for Static Readonly Array Infinite Logic Loop #75436
  • Test issue part 2 #75455
  • Test issue #75454
  • record `with` lowering is uninutitive and unexpected #75452
  • Compiler randomly hangs (deadlock?) only on macOS/Linux #75431
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-35407.57 #75446
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build feature.debugger.main-35407.82 #75445

PullRequests

Created

  • Navigate to the mapped span when navigating to a mapped file #75460
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • VB: Do not use overload resolution while lowering interpolated strings #75449
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Respect [MemberNotNull] on local functions #75448
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

Merged

  • Bail out gracefully when we can't find service #75457
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Fix endianness issues to fix failures in Emit testsuite #75450
    Area-Compilers, Test, Community, Next
  • Do not use overload resolution for expression tree conversion #75427
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Handle span conversions in `is` operator #75413
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - First-class Span Types
  • Add warning when property has a backing field but a manually implemented accessor does not use it #75325
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Revert "Split out ref safety analysis into a separate pass after binding (#64928)" #75406
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Only provide fallback options for host analyzers #75317
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged, Needs API Review, VSCode
  • EE: Handle notification when metadata has been invalidated #75423
    Area-Interactive, untriaged
  • WIP: Support unbound generic types in 'nameof' operator. #75368
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • WIP: Support modifiers with simple lambda parameters. #75400
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Have find references navigate to a position instead of a span #75418
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Fixing the OOM in scripting #75372
    Area-Interactive, untriaged, VSCode
  • Fix updating solution fallback options #75417
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Report diagnostics from `TryFindDisposePatternMethod` when binding `foreach` loop #75422
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Fix circularity issue with binding const local #75371
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Verify that semantic snippets obey IDE preferences #75073
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Skip tests on Mono #75160
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Allow suppressing foreach iteration variable nullability mismatch #75432
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types, untriaged
  • Fix assignment analysis of ref fields #75340
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Clear current value when awaiting in async-iterator #75426
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • OpenApi custom polymorphic type names #58332
    .NET 10 Planning
  • .NET 9 OpenAPI doesn't support [Consumes] multiple content types correctly. #58329
  • OpenIdConnectHandler.ValidateTokenUsingHandlerAsync() does not copy a value from the _configuration.Issuer #58327
  • Perf regression: fortunes #58326
  • `dotnet dev-certs https` no longer creates a folder if one does not exist #58330
  • FluentCheckbox / InputCheckbox not be able to render correctly with @bind- attributes when unsafe-eval is not part of the Content Security Policy #58322
  • Blazor: Use of `--no-build` with `dotnet publish` breaks content with .NET 9 #58321
  • In .NET 8, a request Record with a property decorated with [FromBody] is no longer model-binded #58319
  • OpenAPI documentation is incorrect when using custom TryParse() binding with Minimal APIs #58318
  • Inconsistent component initialization with Blazor SectionOutlet/SectionContent and CascadingValue #58316
  • [Blazor WASM] Upgrading project to .NET 8.0.10 breaks WASM #58313
    .NET 10 Planning
  • Support async callbacks in SignalR typescript client #58309
    Backlog
  • Quickgrid date formatting can't change when changing culture #58308

Closed

  • CancellationTokenSource potential leaks in SignalR HubConnection #57232
    10.0-preview1
  • Perf improvement: plainTextNoParamsEmptyFilter #58302
  • Perf improvement: plainTextWithFilter #58312

PullRequests

Created

  • Hot Reload agent improvements #58333
    area-blazor
  • Parse enum unions in config #58328
    area-networking
  • Update source-build team references #58324
    area-infrastructure
  • [release/9.0] Validate scopes in OpenApiDocumentProvider tests and fix scope #58320
    area-mvc
  • [release/9.0] Fix handling for inert route parameters in MVC #58311
    area-mvc
  • Fix missing bullet list items in InputDate documentation #58310
    area-blazor, community-contribution, 10.0-preview1

Merged

  • Add a note about when to validate ping payloads #57795
    area-networking, 10.0-preview1
  • Fix #57232 potential CancellationTokenSource leak in HubConnection #58303
    area-signalr, community-contribution, 10.0-preview1
  • Add additional ProblemDetails default types and titles #58101
    community-contribution, area-minimal, 10.0-preview1
  • fix: Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.Testing RedirectHandler HasBody doesn't work with PATCH #58269
    area-mvc, community-contribution, feature-mvc-testing, 10.0-preview1
  • Validate scopes in OpenApiDocumentProvider tests and fix scope #58307
    area-mvc, feature-openapi, 10.0-preview1
  • [Infrastructure] Updated npm packages 2024-10-08 #58301
    area-infrastructure, 10.0-preview1
  • [Blazor] Apply CORS also to .mjs files #58287
    area-blazor, 10.0-preview1
  • Fix handling for inert route parameters in MVC #58246
    area-mvc, feature-openapi, 10.0-preview1
  • Add source generator to emit public Program class definition #58199
    area-infrastructure, area-minimal, 10.0-preview1

Updated

  • Use new Dictionary AlternateLookup to avoid allocation in DictionaryJumpTable #58305
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Enable code analysis and address initial set of issues. #58304
    area-networking
  • Fix for: Minimal APIs and controllers treat header arrays differently #58251
    community-contribution, area-minimal
  • [TEST] Upload windows event logs #57923
    area-infrastructure, * NO MERGE *
  • [s390x] Fix Extensions.ApiDescription.Client tests on s390x #58235
    area-commandlinetools, community-contribution
  • Add Description to ProducesResponseType (and others) for better OpenAPI document creation #58193
    community-contribution, feature-openapi, area-networking

entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Better document the difference between `DumpType.Normal` and `DumpType.Triage` #4491

Updated

Merged

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Android: Minimum and MaximumHeightRequest are not respected on controls when HeightRequest is also set (same for Width) #25163
  • IOS Xcode 16 Strip exited with code 139 error #25162
  • Visual Studio 17.11.5 causes Windows MAUI to break build #25160
    .NET 8 SR9.2
  • Any view's Loaded event is called when navigating away from the page #25156
  • Changing visibility in child elements does not work #25154
  • Theme issue on Search bar control in .NET MAUI #25153
    Backlog
  • [9.0 RC2, Windows] After upgrading to 9.0 RC2, the game crashes at start both in Debug and Release configuration #25150
    .NET 9.0 GA
  • create xarchive with dotnet publish on windows #25149
  • .AddCompatibilityRenderer() for old renderer using interface IVisualElementRenderer doesn't work in .NET MAUI #25148
  • Toolbar Above Keyboard Not Visible in Entry on iOS Platform #25147
  • [Android] HeightRequest and WidthRequest overrides MaximumHeightRequest and MaximumWidthRequest #25143
  • Microsoft.Maui.Handlers.ButtonHandler' threw an exception. On Release Build - App Launch #25142

Closed

  • Margin presented as Padding on iOS inside a CollectionView #25144
  • [Windows] The title bar is shown doubly if I set `Window.AppWindow.TitleBar.ExtendsContentIntoTitleBar` as false. #22894
    Backlog
  • [WinUI] First Entry/Editor gets focus if put inside ScrollView #11472
    .NET 9 Planning

    .NET 9 Planning

  • [Testing] HandlerDoesNotLeak.DatePicker #24147

Created

  • Fixed Microsoft.Maui.Controls 8.0.90 (Latest stable) Ruins Entry Controls #25006
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-controls-entry

  • Increment build targets to iOS 18 #25140
    do-not-merge
  • Fixed Button doesn't reset to "Normal" if scrolled quickly to the top in IOS #25084

  • [Winodws] Fixed TextCell Command executes only once #25066

  • [Android] Tabs briefly display wrong background color when navigating between flyout items #24965

  • Relative layout content disappeared when Relative layout has the border with border stroke element. #24841

  • Revert #24222 and simply use `invalidate` instead of `postInvalidate` #24990

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Using projection with nested expressions. #34866
  • "The entity type" "is mapped to the stored procedure" "however the store-generated properties" "are not mapped to any output parameter or result column." #34863
  • Query optimization compares case sensitively while SqlServer is case insensitive? #34862
  • [Microsoft.Data.Sqlite] Version of NuGet dependency SQLitePCLRaw.bundle_e_sqlite3 does not correspond with source code #34860

Closed

  • Memory leak in .Net 8 using Entity Framework and Sqllite (.Net Maui Android) #34836
  • Is MariaDB supported? #34867
  • Allow changing the database schema without defining a table name #34859

PullRequests

Created

  • Expose SQLite VFS option in connection string #34864
  • Add implementation for Nanoseconds and Microseconds for DateTime[Offset], TimeSpan, {Date|Time}Only. #34861
  • Fix to #34749 - Created query for projection with ownedMany and join is wrong #34858

Merged

  • Update System.Runtime.Caching #34865
  • Throw when a nested entity type is mapped to a different JSON column. #34816
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0 #34853
  • small xml doc fix (copy paste error) #34857

Updated

  • Bump Microsoft.AspNetCore.OData from 8.2.5 to 9.0.0 #34842
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • Handle GO within a sql statement better #34786
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0' => 'main' #34770
  • Merging internal commits for release/8.0 #34854
  • fix-kusto-scaffold #34832
